page.title: Reaction force
page.t: Reacts to enemies attacking your assets nearby.
When idle should we dock. If false or home is not a station we will patrol our home system.
Max range this force will respond from home.
Should we respond to ships that are under attack? \(Always Responds In Sector\)
The HP \(Hull + Shield\) Percentage to trigger a response.
Should we respond to stations that are under attack? \(Always Responds In Sector\)
The HP \(Hull + Shield\) Percentage to trigger a response.
Should we respond to the player?
Should we respond to the distress Distress?
Wenn aktiviert , wird der Spieler bei Entsendung der Reaktionsstreitkr√§fte informiert.
